'''Grilled Tiger Fish''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Grilled Tiger Fish is obtainable from [[Chef Mao]] at [[Wanmin Restaurant]] for 1,250 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 10.

Depending on the quality, Grilled Tiger Fish restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP and an additional '''800'''/'''1,000'''/'''1,200''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this can not target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Keqing|Survival Grilled Fish}}

==Trivia==
*The following birthday mails included Grilled Tiger Fish:
**[[Mail/Would You Like a Midnight Snack? (2022-05-21)|Yun Jin's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (5 Grilled Tiger Fish)
* To celebrate Keqing's birthday, the official Chinese site for ''Genshin Impact'' published a blog post purportedly by Long Erjun, columnist for [[The Steambird]], with a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/11751 real-life recipe] for Grilled Tiger Fish. Also included in this edition was a recipe for Survival Grilled Fish.
* The lore for [[Fillet Blade]] also mentions that Grilled Tiger Fish was originally Grilled Ticker Fish.
* The dish shares its recipe with [[Mondstadt Grilled Fish]].
